name: Sakura-iro Prism
description: Sin descripción

name: Put Your Brain on 2
description: Put Your Brain On 2 is a casual-puzzle game about thinking and organizing tactics.

name: Exclusively Yours: An Office Affair
description:
You're an executive assistant - starting today!
The charming, talented executives and a rival who shows up out of the blue - want to know: whose assistant do you want to be?

name: Ruina: Haito no Monogatari
description: Sin descripción

name: Unreal Flash 3
description: Unreal Flash 3 is an arena shooter inspired by the popular game Unreal Tournament. Run, jump, collect weapons, kill your enemies and survive as long as you can. Play the story mode of Unreal Flash 3 or choose between the 4 free modes Deathmatch, Capture the Flag, Instagib and King of the Hill.

name: Unreal Flash 2007
description: Unreal Flash 2007 throws you into an adrenaline junkie's paradise combining pick-up and play simplicity with fast-paced action in this 2D platform shooter with AI opponents.

name: Territory War 3
description: Online sequel to the popular flash arena frag games, Territory War. Features new maps, new weapons, gameplay modes and new ways to earn XP, and level up. Including a new level editor, for you to create the arena of your dreams - and your friend's nightmares.

name: Tangrams
description: Tangrams are fun for children of all ages. Complete the puzzle by moving and rotating the seven shapes. A fun way to work problem solving and visual spatial skills.

name: Come Home
description: After your father goes missing you must return to your home town and find him. Reconnect with childhood friends, meet new people, and find your father.

name: Tactical Assassin
description: In Tactical Assassin the player takes on a role of a stick figure sniper, eliminating fellow stick figures for a secret organization. One of the original "Sniper Stick" games.

name: Stick War
description: Stick War is a classic strategy war game featuring stick figures. A popular flagship game among early flash game websites.

name: KMines
description: KMines is a classic Minesweeper game. The idea is to uncover all the squares without blowing up any mines. When a mine is blown up, the game is over.

name: Ankh 2
description:
Satisfy your intellectual curiosity while playing games. The culmination of 30 years of research into Egypt by Sakuji Yoshimura.

Will you be able to get your hands on the Ankh, the fabric of life?
Can you hand the Ankh over to the builder of the Great Pyramid, who waits for you in the underworld? Another epic adventure in Egypt.

name: Minesweeper
description: Minesweeper is a pre-installed game in Red Star OS 2.0.

name: Ankh 3
description:
Satisfy your intellectual curiosity while playing games. The culmination of 30 years of research into Egypt by Sakuji Yoshimura.

Will you be able to get your hands on the Ankh, the fabric of life?
Can you hand the Ankh over to the builder of the Great Pyramid, who waits for you in the underworld? Yet another epic adventure in Egypt.

name: Rainbow Breakout
description: A short and satisfying breakout concept game.

name: Solitaire
description: Solitaire is a pre-installed game in Red Star OS 2.0.

name: Color Matching
description: Color Matching is a pre-installed game in Red Star OS 2.0.

name: Atom Fit
description: Atom Fit is a pre-installed game in Red Star OS 2.0.

name: Race for The White House
description: Choose Obama, or McCain and make a mad dash for The White House. Collect campaign donations to speed up your campaign.

name: Top Flight Turtle
description: In the future, turtles will have jetpacks! Maybe. Well, probably not, but if they did they'd have to patrol their turf with laser guns and bombs. Defend your pond as Top Flight Turtle!

name: Creepy Halloween Differences
description: Find the creepy differences in each Halloween scene.

name: One Ton Reloaded
description: The game play has changed, but One Ton is still as tough as ever. Shoot, bash, and smash your way through hordes of humanoid robots.

name: Into the Necrovale
description: Into the Necrovale is an Action RPG in which you collect powerful items that interact in unexpected ways. You must be clever with your build if you hope to pierce the mysteries and dangers of the Necrovale, where a thousand generations of miscreants and criminals have been banished.

name: Nanovor
description: Nanovor was a massively multi-player online card battle video game developed by Smith & Tinker. With a trailblazing multi-media release it quickly rose in popularity and became a cult hit of MMO flash based battlers before being taken offline only a couple years later.

name: FTB Oceanblock
description:
OceanBlock is a new unique modpack created by the FTB Team inspired by the countless island-based modpacks. Expect many changes to what you’re used to, encounter custom structures within the deep depths of the sea. Experience the true beauty of the obsidian boat, especially in water. With over 550 quests to guide you through this wet and wild journey, you’ll never loose things to do. Nor will you feel bored, with the addition of rafts to break. A new addiction can form, the endless hunt for treasures among the infinite oceans. An entirely new crafting system, Tempered jars. As you follow the quests, diving into new draconic technology. “Enjoy” the lack of ability to swim. Jump into the ocean with a scuba suit. Sluice gravel, sand, dirt and dust for resources.

Dive into this new drenched, world.

name: Batman & Robin
description: Batman & Robin is an unreleased game for the Sega Saturn. It was a port of the PlayStation game of the same name, however was cancelled before release, presumably due to negative reception.

name: Seifuku: High School Countdown
description: Seifuku: High School Countdown is an unreleased game for the Sega Saturn.

name: Arma 3 Creator DLC: S.O.G. Prairie Fire
description: Experience the intensity of the Vietnam War on a monumental scale. Featuring three vast terrains, a new co-op campaign, single/multiplayer scenarios, and dozens of weapons and vehicles, players can quell uprisings, run recon missions, and wage war in a historic take on Arma 3’s military sandbox.

name: Macaroni Houren Shou Interactive
description: Sin descripción

name: The Serpent
description: Sin descripción

name: Slingo Adventure
description:
Get ready to play the latest release from everyone's favorite puzzle franchise, Slingo!
Join The Joker, The Cherub, and other classic Slingo characters on a bingo quest through the world of Fair Chance! It’s up to you to recover King Diamond’s stolen scepter and rescue the Queen from everyone’s favorite Slingo nemesis, The Devil.
Slingo Adventure combines classic slot machine gameplay with Bingo and Keno style number matching. Play through over 1000 (and counting) fun, fast paced levels by spinning, daubing, and wagering your way to success. Don’t forget! The faster you match, the bigger the bonus!

Use Power Ups to overcome challenges! Invite your friends via Facebook and keep track on each other’s progress and scores! Enjoy a variety of skill and chance minigames that let you wager your score! Newly added is the Collapse mode where you must clear the board within a set time! This is Slingo like you’ve never seen before!

name: Pasha Planet: Reborn
description: “Pasha Planet: Reborn” is the debut game of Scorpio Game, a Taiwanese independent game development studio. Prepare to be charmed by unique hand-painted scenes and have fun with light detective work, players will get to explore the main game plot that revolves around the characters’ daily life through an immersive and one-of-a-kind puzzle-solving gameplay.

name: Mahjong Aztecs Mysteries
description:
Reveal the ancient mystery. Uncover secret of the Aztecs. Get ready to face the adventure of pyramids. This game will reveal your true skills. Play like a pro!
Mahjong is an ancient game that originated in China. It is a game of skill, intelligence, calculation and luck.
The aim is to clear up the board of stones and not to bring down the whole pyramid! The quicker you clear the pyramid the more points you'll get. Good Luck!

name: Dragon Defender: Castle Kingdom Quest
description: Dragons are invading! They are destroying the village and threaten your castle! Defend it with your magic bow! Watch out for ogres and villagers running for help! Will your kingdom survive?

name: Crystal Lines
description: Crystal Lines is the most classic and amazing board game featuring addictive gameplay and tons of exciting new balls and power ups! Once you play , you can't stop!

name: 100 Doors of Revenge
description:
The sequel of the one of the most popular puzzle game 100 Doors 2013
This is absolutely new improved and very addictive game in this kind.
More logical and user friendly game will hook you at the start!

name: Buddy, No!
description:
Buddy, the cute English bulldog who belongs to a world renowned inventor, is about to embark on a fast paced adventure like no other! His master recently invented a contraption that can create an unlimited supply of food for free! This one invention could literally change the world forever. It’s time to take it for a test drive in “Buddy, No!”

Get ready for an intense arcade-style game that will have you hooked from the very beginning! “Buddy, No!” is inspired by old-school handheld games that will bring high intensity mixed with a nostalgic feel. As the inventor’s machine begins to produce delicious food, Buddy licks his lips in anticipation! Burgers, ice cream, fries, and more fall from the machine and Buddy is happily waiting to gobble up the falling goodies. Watch out for the harmful objects that fall as well! Dodge the bad, feed on the good, and satisfy the hungry bulldog’s appetite! Yummy!

name: Pylon Town
description: Western Power Distribution provides power to 7.9 million customers in the Midlands, the South West and South Wales. This new ‘Pylon Town’ app includes 7 brand new games that are aimed at delivering knowledge, safety and attitudes towards electricity.

name: Mutant Fighting Cup
description:
Unlock, combine and splice your way to victory using your genetically engineered pet.
Raise him to be the greatest fighter the world has ever seen and battle it out over 5 continents.

Hone your skills in Europe, South America, Africa, Asia and North America before entering the World Cup for immortal glory.

Do you have what it takes to defeat all of the mutant fighter competitors?

name: DiggerSim
description:
DiggerSim - Virtual reality Excavator & Heavy Equipment Simulator.

DiggerSim is a thrilling excavator and heavy equipment simulator that puts you in the driver's seat of a powerful excavator. With realistic controls, you'll feel like you're really operating heavy machinery.

In this game, you'll be tasked with completing a variety of excavation jobs, from digging foundations to clearing land. You'll have to carefully manoeuvre your excavator through tight spaces and navigate around obstacles to complete the level.

As you progress through the game, you'll challenges that will test your skills and abilities. With immersive gameplay and realistic controls, Digger Sim is the ultimate experience for fans of construction and heavy machinery. So put on your hard hat and get ready to dig in!

name: Lawbringer
description: Lawbringer is a fast-paced arena fighting roguelite. Hack, slash and shoot your way through enemy hordes to appease the Autarch. The faster you slay your enemies, the greater His favor. Pick up game changing skills and a variety of weapons. Kill fast, grow strong and cheat death.

name: Banana Attack VR
description: Shoot zombie limbs off and watch their ragdoll bodies fall then cook their delicious remains over the fire and feed it to your cute little fox!

name: Extreme Car Drift Simulator
description: If you want to drift wildly, this game is for you. With the drift game, you can have a great car driving simulation experience.

name: House of the Soul
description: Begin a journey of deception and discovery in 'HOUSE OF THE SOUL', a first-person exploration and story based experience. Explore an isolated mansion and descend into its lower levels as you discover the hidden secret project of the obsessive inventor who lives there.

name: Glass Heart
description: A 20% chance is all you have to survive the surgery. Will love give you the strength to continue this life or will you be singing with the angels? The choice is yours in Glass Heart.

name: Chess Defense Saga
description: A chess-themed tower defense game with unique strategies, stories, and illustrations!

name: LightFall
description: A spirit that lived high in the sky falls to an underground city where gravity is randomly reversed for some reason. It's a 2D flat-former game where you have to explore the underworld and find a way to climb up to get back to where you were.

name: Station Watch
description: Station Watch is a side-scrolling strategy base-building game where you clear randomly generated Roguelike stations infested with monsters. By rallying robots and clearing rooms, you will be able to destroy hives and recapture the station piece by piece.

name: Ancient Guardians: The Dragon
description: A medieval dragon and magic roguelite

name: Efemeris
description: Efemeris is an strategy boardgame dedicated to 2 players.

name: Retro Kart
description: Retro Wreckfest is a fast-paced online race where you can blow your enemies to smithereens to a gorgeous soundtrack that you can add yourself, while enjoying the gorgeous views of the stylized RetroWave tracks

name: Qualia: The Path of Promise
description: “Machina” is the world's first android to pass the Turing Test. Incidentally, she is also dressed like a maid. Dr. Hiro Koshino ends up taking Machina home and has her work as a maid. As she continues to learn and grow, he also begins to develop certain feelings towards her…

name: Raiden III x Mikado Maniax: Deluxe Edition
description: Deluxe Edition includes: The game, Digital Soundtrack (download code) plus a Mini Poster!

name: Trek to Yomi: Deluxe Edition
description:
Trek to Yomi: Deluxe Edition includes:

- Base Game
- Soundtrack CD
- 104 Page Artbook
- Ultimate Edition Box

name: WWE 2K23: Deluxe Edition
description:
The value of WWE 2K23 is Even Stronger with the Deluxe Edition*!

The Deluxe Edition includes:

• Pre-Order Bonus Pack
• Season Pass: Includes all 5 post-launch DLC character packs, the MyRISE Mega-Boost pack, with 200 additional Attribute Points, and the Supercharger pack which unlocks all base-game WWE Legends and throwback arenas. Release timing of the DLC contents will be revealed at a future date.
• Bonus MyFACTION Content: Includes a John Cena EVO card, Emerald-tier Bianca Belair, and Gold-tier Asuka and Edge cards, plus 3 Basic Day 1 MyFACTION card packs
• 3-Day Early Access

name: Endless Dungeon: Day One Edition
description: Endless Dungeon is a unique blend of roguelite, tactical action, and tower defense set in the award-winning Endless Universe. Plunge into an abandoned space station alone or with friends in co-op, recruit a team of shipwrecked heroes, and protect your crystal against never-ending waves of monsters... or die trying, get reloaded, and try again.

name: The Terminator
description:
Similar to adaptations of The Terminator on other systems, the Sega CD game is a platformer where the player controls Kyle Reese, who travels back in time from the year 2029 to protect Sarah Connor from the unstoppable killing machine known as the Terminator.

The game consists of 10 levels. Future locations include the post-apocalyptic wasteland of 2029 Los Angeles and the time displacement complex. In the present of 1984, Reese must traverse the streets and rooftops of L.A., as well as the Tech Noir club, the police station, and, for the finale, an automated factory.

name: Chop Suey
description:
Chop Suey is a martial arts fighting game developed by Adam Billyard for the Atari 8-bit family. It was published in 1985 by English Software. Antic Software published the game in the US. The title is a repurposing of the name of the American Chinese dish chop suey.

Chop Suey is a one-on-one martial arts fighting game. The action takes place on a box-type stage, watched by an audience sitting in several rows of seats in front of two competitors. Each successful attack on an opponent means their pain bar goes up and when the bar is full, the POW symbol will start blinking. It means the player is in a very fragile state of health - one more punch or kick and the fighter will fall. The match ends when the fighter falls eight times or the timer runs out. At the top of each wall air vents will open occasionally, allowing scorpions to drop to the floor and scuttle away. The players should avoid them at all costs, as they give potentially lethal bites.

If the player is victorious, a more difficult opponent is faced in the next match.

Source: Wikipedia

name: Assault on Proxima
description: Lock and load with Strike Force Delta in this action-packed sci-fi FPS! Play solo or team up to blast through hordes of Gacrux alien invaders, save humanity’s colonies, and dominate intense PvP showdowns. Gear up, soldier, and get ready to lead the Assault on Proxima!

name: Ornament Express
description: Investigate strange oddities in Ornament Express, where you're hired to recover your client's belongings from an eccentric thief and his train of stolen artifacts. Explore a cabinet of curiosities throughout the train, visit carts holding odd puzzles, odder objects and find hidden away secrets.

name: Afterimage: Deluxe Edition
description:
Metroidvania made as an action platform game. In Afterimage we play the role of an adventurer who travels across the fantastic land of Engardin, searching for its secrets, solving its problems and facing numerous dangers.

Afterimage Deluxe Edition includes:
- Base Game
- Digital Soundtrack
- Digital Artbook
- Reversible Cover Sheet

name: The Crown of Wu: Legend Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: TankLab
description: Operate the tank to fire bullets! Defeat your opponents and claim victory! Choose your favorite skill and conquer the field! A pop and simple shooting game.

name: LEGO The Robot Chronicles
description: In this game the player helps to defend LEGO City from Doctor Inferno and his robots. This is accomplished by doing missions for various LEGO characters.

name: Head-to-Head Karate
description: Head to Head Karate is a Commodore 64 fighting sports game released in 1987 by Softdisk Publishing.

name: Under the Sky World: Another
description: "Under the Sky World' is another story of if. If Karin in the main plot infected with a virus, so on the wrong path of words ......This is a small story about Karin's "if".

name: Ganbare Jajamaru Saisho ha Goo
description: Sin descripción

name: Field of Glory II: Swifter than Eagles
description: Smite your foes with bow and spear as you lead your mighty chariots to glorious victory. Swifter than Eagles extends Field of Glory II backwards to the dawn of “civilised” warfare, covering the period from 2500-681 BC.

name: Minecraft: Festive Mash-up
description: Wander through a winter wonderland! World, textures, skins, and more!

name: Eggcelerate! to the North Pole
description: Race through winter with slippery physics attempting to carry an egg on top of your vehicle! Time-trial your way to the top of the leaderboards, collect 100 snowmen and snowwomen hidden around the world, and do your best not to break an egg!

name: Eggcelerate! to the Tropics
description: Race through rainforests and beaches with motorcycles to navigate the winding paths while attempting to carry an egg! Time-trial your way to the top of the leaderboards, find and collect hidden treasures and artifacts, and do your best not to break an egg!

name: Keeper of the Valley
description: Jump, glide and dash your way to the top of the mountain in this 3D adventure platformer set in an open and enchanting valley!

name: Strength & Virtue: Trials of the Romer
description: A 2.5D atmospheric survival RPG with active-time battles in which you play as a Nomad of the wasteland. After he saves a city-dweller, he begins to question everything he once believed. There is no easy path here, only a brutal landscape that only the most resilient can survive.

name: Beep's Escape
description: Play as Beep, a brave yet cavalier robot who is on a mission to escape from the strange tech facility that he and his fellow bots are being held captive in. Using just your wits and the items you find around you, will you help Beep find a route to safety?

name: Poly Memory: Butterflies
description: Cute, relaxing, polygonal memory game with butterflies.

name: Wipeout Merge
description:
The adrenaline-fuelled anti-gravity ships of PlayStation’s Wipeout series combine with compelling merge gameplay and card collection in Wipeout Merge.

Merge iconic Wipeout ships and fly them around legendary tracks to earn credits. Test new ships and weapons to master your skills before competing in races. Spend your winnings to purchase upgrades and boost your ships’ stats, improving your credits-per-second.

name: Minecraft: Greek Mythology Mash-up
description: Build a pantheon fit for the gods, trap the Minotaur in an elaborate maze, or set sail for adventures across the sea. The world is your square oyster!

name: Stereogram
description: A split-screen platformer in a broken world. Featuring 100 rooms spread across 6 zones.

name: About a Mouse
description: Mutation, it is the key to our evolution, it has enabled us to evolve from a single celled organism, into the dominate species on the planet. But every few hundred millennia, evolution leaps forward.

name: Pip XL
description: Pip XL — cute puzzle game with pipes. Enjoy a relaxing time connecting pipes.

name: Skull Hunter
description: Sin descripción

name: She Vomited Guns
description: A tragic gun shortage has brought many fortunes to the Synthetic Order, who are in the bleeding edge of arms development.

name: Minecraft: LittleBigPlanet Edition
description:
Mix the crazy, non-stop creativity of LittleBigPlanet into the endless fun and freedom of Minecraft with this special mashup pack.
Sackboy, Sackgirl, OddSock, Toggle, and Swoop will decorate your Minecraft universe with a whole heap of LBP characters, creatures, and stuff.

name: W.A.R.P.
description:
3 Game Modes.
Perfect for quick games at all times.
More than 140 stages.

name: Package Dudes
description: Package Dudes is a fast-paced local co-op game in which you play the role of a package sorting employees. Playing on your own or in teams, you'll struggle with a never-slowing conveyor belt, on which packages arrive. Sort them correctly and fight for the title of employee of the day!

name: Tennis Online Duel
description: Online Tennis Duel is a realistic first person tennis game with an ideal physical ball. Play with your friends or someone random across the internet.

name: Shiodome Train Simulator
description: A realistic fictional railcar driving game is now available! Please enjoy driving on the various types of lines, over 70 km long, multiple tracks, tunnels, and various scenery changes. Single-track sections and many other types of trains are scheduled to be available in the future.

name: Of Sense and Soul
description: A queer Victorian romance visual novel in which a gentleman running from the past and a poet hiding from the future collide through a lonely hearts ad. Suddenly, their lives can blossom—if you choose to change them.

name: Deceive Inc.: Black Tie Edition
description:
Dress to impress with the Deceive Inc. Black Tie Edition!

Every Black Tie Edition Includes:
Exclusive ‘Black Tie’ outfits for all 8 Agents
Custom ‘Black Tie’ Profile Portrait & Title
1,000 Deceive Inc. Bonds

name: Train Sim World 3: Deluxe Edition + Loco Bundle
description: Master more machines with Train Sim World 3: Deluxe Edition & Loco Bundle, featuring the Training Center, Kassel-Würzburg, Cajon Pass, Southeastern Highspeed and Spirit of Steam, plus the Rail Head Treatment Train, Dispolok BR 182 and Santa Fe F7!

name: Fumpers
description: Fumpers? Your goal is to complete the track by jumping. Let's See How Quick You Can Be at Doing This.

name: Forsaken AR: Darkest Delivery
description: Forsaken AR is a fanmade mod that continues Five Nights at Freddys AR where Illumix left off. Forsaken AR adds a ton of new features and content to the game, while keeping the best parts of FNaF AR.

name: Capcom Arcade Stadium: Progear
description: Add Progear to your Capcom Arcade Stadium game line-up!

name: PowerWash Simulator: Tomb Raider Special Pack
description:
Whilst some seek the thrill of adventure, others prefer good clean fun - that’s where you come in! Grapple with grime in the ultimate quest to defeat all dirt covering Croft Manor and its grounds, along with Lara’s trusty vehicles.

Lara’s childhood home is impressive but in need of some serious TLC to restore it to its full potential - rumour has it, the owner much prefers a life of danger to domesticity. You’ve been commissioned to undertake the ultimate cleaning caper.

Your client may be used to less-than-ideal conditions out on the trail, but only the very best will do when it comes to the Croft residence. Unwind and blast away every speck of dirt you can track down, whilst Lara regales you with tales of past adventures.

name: Gyakuten Live!
description: Gyakuten Live! is a Love Live fangame with Ace Attorney-style gameplay. Travel through the adventures of your favourite school idols as you solve mysteries and prove the innocence of your clients. Currently has: 2 episodes, with more on the way!

name: Elemental, Querido Gunso
description: Embark on this adventure together with Gunso and many other characters to defeat the Enedusi and bring peace back to the world! In "Elemental, Querido Gunso", you'll be able to fight against your enemies thanks to the cannon that our protagonist has installed on his wing, solve puzzles with the obstacles you find along the way and... much more!

name: Gamehunt
description: A game about buying a game.

name: Digimon
description: A Flash adventure game developed by Delaino Barris and formerly hosted on the Fox Kids site.

name: The Crew: Motorfest
description: Welcome to Motorfest! Join a one-of-a-kind festival and enjoy the best experiences car culture has to offer in a beautiful Hawaiian open world.

name: Epic War 2
description:
Epic War 2 - can you defeat the coming evil? This is the second episode of Epic War. Humans, orcs, and elves are working together to face the shadow's army that is threatening to erase all the living beings.

Play this online game and utilize the upgrade system and 3 huge races - elves, orcs, and humans. To start, play as humans - the other two races are unlocked further into this free online game. Start with the training missions as these teach you the basics of the game.

name: Epic War 3: War of Heroes
description: Epic War 3 (or Epic War 3: War of Heroes) is the third game of the Epic War series. The third game in the series features wider and more refined gameplay with more effort into stylization and game flow balance.

name: Epic War 4: Alliance of Heroes
description: Epic War 4 is the sequel to Epic War 3. It is a tactical warfare game which starts out easy, but has a steep difficulty curve. The game revolves around summoning creatures and attack the opponent's castle. You must destroy your opponent's castle before he can destroy yours. The fourth Epic War game features a few improvements over the third.

name: Epic War 5: Hell's Gate
description: Epic War 5 is a strategy game, where you get to fight for the territory. This time with 3 heroes, 30 units, and 70 different skills. Construct a massive army, build up your base defenses and attack the enemy base. The most important thing - don't let your hero die. The fifth game of Epic War; features include new dialogue and refined progression system.

name: Epic War Saga
description: Epic War Saga, also known as Epic War MMO, or in the case of the relaunch, EpicWar Saga, is the sixth Epic War Game. Epic War Saga has a large fan base, however, the rating is lower then some of the other Epic Wars due to the energy system. The energy system was eventually removed. Epic War Saga has been anticipated for re-release after popularity shortened from Flash Player's expiration.

name: Epic War Legends
description: Epic War Legends was vastly different from any of the previous Epic War games. It was more of an RPG than a Strategy game. Players chose one of six heroes at the beginning, and there was a cost to change the hero. Players also equipped a main and reserve army; if a troop died the troop in the reserve would take over. Players clicked to walk, which depleted energy, and all events on their way were mandatory, except for vs PvP. During the battles players had no control, instead all troops including the hero attacked automatically until all troops on one side died, or the battle timed out (which the timer was not displayed).

name: Epic War VI
description: Epic War 6 is the latest sequel of Epic War Games. In this game you will control heroes with their unique army. Train your hero and unlock their units to conquer all mission in all over continent.

name: My Crush, My Bully
description: My Bully, My Crush is a short kinetic visual novel with yuri romance as its theme. It is around 40 minutes long.

name: American Truck Simulator: Western Star 5700XE
description: American Truck Simulator is no stranger to the Western Star brand. With 2 of their newest trucks, the 49X and 57X, already available in-game, today we are excited to announce the arrival of a legend. Introducing the Western Star 5700XE, which is now available at your Western Star Trucks dealership in American Truck Simulator!

name: HiQ Ace Deluxe
description:
Deluxe edition contains all 192 previously released levels.

In the puzzle race become the HiQ Ace.
Enjoy the high quality classic jigsaw puzzle game with the arcade twist.
Master your mind and sharpen your eyes to be the jigsaw puzzle master - the HiQ Ace.
Unlock two additional game modes. In Relax Mode there are only puzzle pieces and you. If you seek more challenge, then pick the Expert mode.
Discover dozens of beautiful high definition puzzle boards. Play fast to unlock the power-ups and beat the clock.

name: Dead Unending
description: A deadly virus plagues the city in Null County and the residents now roam the streets as flesh-eating zombies. Tactically loot the massive open world and build a self-sustaining zombie-killing fortress. Will you be able to survive the apocalypse or will you become one of the undead?

name: Reverse Woman of Human Ball
description: Ball Transportation instant-death and race game 'Reverse Woman of Human Ball'. You steer 156mph 'Reverse Woman' and do jobs transporting ball like human 'Human Ball'. To be delicate to deal with vulnerable human-ball like eggs and to be bravery to transport human-ball within the limit time.

name: You Can Do!mino
description: Is this a puzzle or a simulation? I can't define the genre of the game. Clear the stage in various ways. Use different special dominoes and play the game with objects.

name: SpongeBob SquarePants: The Cosmic Shake - Costume Pack
description: The Official Cosmic Shake Costume Pack, including 7 additional SpongeBob costumes! Pizza glide as Opposite Day Bob or karate kick as Band Geek while you make your way through this brand-new SpongeBob adventure.

name: Skyemont Battle
description: Battle your way through hordes of enemies, find treasure, and explore cool maps! Skyemont Battle is a simple hack and slash designed to be fun an easy to pick up with a survival style twist.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Vibrant Valentine
description: 1 Brand New Table with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Valentine's Day themed table with 2 controllable cannons and massive flippers!.

name: Prizma Puzzle Prime
description: Tile-based puzzle game with smooth and addictive gameplay, old-school isometric graphics and excellent music. The player's task is to connect nodes which have various functions.

name: Nixxsz Castle
description: Nixxsz Castle is a classic 2D platformer. Inspired by the gold standard of action games from previous generations, Nixxsz Castle brings a new adventure with modern gameplay

name: Myristica
description: XUM studios' singleplayer horror game Myristica takes place in Karnataka, India. You have ran out of fuel on your way home from a long day of river fishing, only to stumble upon a mystifying, yet deadly swamp. Can you get out alive before you fall prey to the elements?

name: Legends of Dionysos
description: Legends of Dionysos is a 2,5D Action RPG. Fast paced gameplay and hordes of enemies! Customize yor character and level up. Find precious loot and get stronger to defeat malicious foes. Venture through a beautiful world and slay loads of orcs, demos, dragons and even giant crabs!

name: Gravlist
description: Gravlist is gravitational 2d platformer. Our player tries to overcome all the obstacles in front of him to find his goal

name: Gemscape
description: Ultimate puzzle game with unique gameplay and endless fun! On this fun journey, you will solve exciting puzzles, receive coins for unlocking new levels, use boosters to continue your saga and become the last hope to save the Flying Islands and their magical inhabitants!

name: Firework Simulator
description: Play with a variety of fireworks and even make custom ones yourself using different containers, powders and colors.

name: Breakout 13: Fight
description: Breakout is a narrative adventure game with interactive cinematic experience. It is about a group of misguided youths, who are sent to a correctional center and try to escape.

name: Animal Portal: Puzzle
description: Relax and challenge yourself with this enchanting puzzle game. Navigate through magical portals, each guarded by a unique animal with a different mechanical movement. Solve the puzzles and immerse yourself in a beautiful fantasy world full of color and wonder.

name: Astro & Suzy Go to the Beach
description: Astro & Suzy have finally made it to the beach! And the humans are dropping all kinds of yummy things! Hotdogs! Tacos! Hamburgers! Help Astro & Suzy eat all the wasted human beach food before it hits the ground. But watch out for the Mayo! It will ruin the whole day. Make sure to get all the power-ups like Catsup, Mustard, and Salsa! They increase Astro & Suzy’s food bonus multipliers! And don’t miss the ‘dog bone of invincibility’! (Based on a real-life story that hasn’t happened yet)

name: Ridge Racer 2
description: Ridge Racer 2, originally released on the PSP, enhanced for PS4/PS5 with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Omoide Kakaete Ai ni Koi!!
description:
Spring, the season of encounters and partings. It's spring break, and Sakawa Haruki is about to go into 3rd grade.

His childhood friend group includes: Kuriyama Tomari, Tokorozawa Iku, and Sugou Chisato. 2 new girls just joined the group: Harunohara Yuuna, who lives in the next town over, and Nishitani Shizuru, who just moved into the neighborhood.

Ironically, at the same time these 2 girls joined, Haruki had to move away from home and his childhood friends.

name: Lemonade Stand
description: Make as much money as you can selling lemonade in Lemonade Stand. Buy cups, lemons, sugar, and ice, and mix your own recipe.

name: Full Moon Kit
description: Let's relax and get some refreshment with the cute animals in ‘Full Moon Kit'. Collect more than 90+ free-moving animals and enjoy a cool swim with fountains and bang jumps. Enjoy the beautiful scenery. This is the invitation to the peaceful pool and mysterious world of healing for you.

name: Clubby the Seal
description: Treking across the frozen tundra, Clubby must bash his way through armies of seal clubbers, huge beasts, and a few familiar faces.

name: Knights Beasts & Magic
description: An evil force has swept into your land. Repel these beasts before all is lost. Upgrade your base, and unlock special units to clear 5 levels and claim victory!

name: Stick War 2
description: Stick War 2 - Order Empire; the epic sequel to the hit strategy game Stick War!

name: Knights Beasts & Magic 2
description: A Veil of Darkness is Shadowing your land. The beasts have taken your people by surprise. Their destruction was violent, merciless, and swift. The fate of your kind is under your command. You must engage these enemies in battle in every region of your kingdom. If you have the fortitude, cunning, and resilience to overcome these beasts you will be victorious. If not, the beasts wont rest until they have devoured all life here.

name: Penguin Massacre
description: Defend your igloo and keep shooting the penguins with bigger and better guns, simple as that.

name: Kitten Cannon!
description: Kitten Cannon! is a 2005 game by BurstStudio. It is widely credited with popularizing the "Toss" genre on Newgrounds.

name: Kill the Dog from Duck Hunt!
description: A very popular original newgrounds game, in which parodies the classic Duck Hunt game.

name: Tsugunohi: Supernatural Supermarket
description: Supernatural Supermarket, the 10th game in the J-Horror series Tsugunohi, celebrating its 10th anniversary, comes to Steam! Phantasmic blue hands reach out to grab store merchandize and mysterious writing appears that can't be erased... Get lost in the unnerving world of a supermarket after hours.

name: Quadice
description: A Tile-Matching Puzzle Game

name: Stick to the Plan
description: A relaxing and charming puzzle game about Roberto, a dog who really loves loooooooong sticks with a plan in mind.

name: Immeowtal Festival!
description: One day, Hachiko High School was bathed in heavenly light! The angels descended to judge, and the bodies of the dead dogs were piling up... but they were not all dead yet! Sora the Akita dog, vows to find his surviving furiends and strike back at the angels!

name: Moonsouls: Echoes of the Past
description: You and your nephew Isaac are excited to bring your wares to the Victory Day Festival. But your plans are interrupted when a strange vessel falls from the sky! When Isaac becomes trapped inside, it’s up to you to free him! This won’t be an easy task, as an otherworldly foe has more destructive plans in mind. Can you use new technologies and abilities to save Isaac and the world in time? Find out in this stellar hidden-object puzzle adventure!

name: Capcom Arcade Stadium: Battle Circuit
description: Add Battle Circuit to your Capcom Arcade Stadium game line-up!

name: 137E0 Action 1 Steak
description: A joke rom hack made for the Sonic Hacking Contest 2016.

name: Are You Smarter than a 5th Grader?: Extra Credit
description: Sin descripción

name: Outbreak: The New Nightmare - Definitive Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: It's Christmas Bundle!
description: Sin descripción

name: Goat Simulator: Waste of Space Bundle
description:
Contents: Goat Simulator and Waste of Space DLC

Goat Simulator is the latest in goat simulation technology. You no longer have to fantasize about being a goat; your dreams have finally come true!

Goat simulation is finally leaving the planet where it was once conceived to explore the endless possibilities of space (Though we only had time to explore some of them). Fly and shoot stuff in space, because nobody makes games about flying and shooting in space anymore…

name: Capcom Arcade Stadium: Powered Gear - Strategic Variant Armor Equipment
description: Add Powered Gear - Strategic Variant Armor Equipment - to your Capcom Arcade Stadium game line-up!

name: Golden Record Retriever
description: Golden Record Retriever is a rogue-like dice building game in which a golden retriever kidnapped by aliens grows into a space hero by retrieving the golden records that have become a "space headache.”

name: The Adventures of LinShanHai
description: A Chinese-language walking sim for PC.

name: The You Testament: The 2D Coming
description: This 2D remake of the biblical epic puts YOU on the scene of each story, where you can either repeat history or rewrite it! Follow in the footsteps of a prophet as he seeks to enlighten the masses, and find your place among them as the struggle to survive tests your faith...

name: Fight & Crush
description: How about a rematch?

name: Football Penalty
description:
In the entertaining "Football Penalty" app, you, in turn represent itself as direct and the goalkeeper.
In the app simple and intuitively clear management.
In the menu choose quantity of shots on goal and tap "Play". When you the forward, concern a gate corner to which send a ball. When you the goalkeeper, concern a gate corner in which catch a ball.
Check the intuition. Foresee the direction of a jump of the goalkeeper or kick of the forward.
In the menu you can choose quantity of shots on goal from 5 to 50.
In each series of shots on goal the best and last results remain.
Score the maximum quantity of the goals at the minimum quantity of missed goals.
Good luck!

name: American Basketball: Guns & Balls
description: This ain't just basketball... this here's American Basketball! Yeehaw!

name: Two Hoops
description: Shoot some hoops. If one is fun two are funner. Super simple to play, yet very challenging. Try it now, the more you practice the better you get.

name: Karate Hero
description:
Karate Hero – Become a real karate master!
You can now become a true, black-belt karate master! Be a shocking maiden or a fiery dude! Fight, train and go through the single-player adventure. With 7 exciting martial-arts challenges, you will never be bored and quickly on your way to become a true hero of karate!

name: Metallicars
description: Metallicars is a new way of racing where intelligence rules over ability.

name: Pixel Drifters
description: Get in the driver's seat and drift your way around a variety of obstacles and tight corners. Collect coins, earn combos, complete missions, and unlock the entire fleet of Pixel Drifters!

name: Yo! Ninjia
description: Run, jump and shoot. This is a new type of action game with unique and impressive game experiences you have ever met.

name: Rogue Racing: PinkSlip
description:
Street Racing. Custom Cars. Rogue Attitude
Get ready for a 100% personalized mobile racing experience! Create the ultimate, custom racing rig with over 50 different aftermarket parts and style options.Competie in pulse-pounding, winner-take-all events on gritty, inner-city streets.

name: Mad Crash Racing
description: Avoid the accident with your beautiful red sport car. Do not drive the wrong way of the road. Tap to change the lane.

name: Cube Cube!
description:
A beautiful, minimalistic runner game with lots of challenges and endless fun.
Only 1% can escape through level 10! Are you up for the challenge?

name: Gophy
description: Run underground as a mischievous gopher, taking lawnmowers, flowers and mushrooms! Watch out though, the neighborhood doesn't like you! Watch out for giant spikes and fast cars! While you're running through, collect coins and redeem them in the Gophy Store for exciting new items!

name: R.P.G
description:
Let's play rollcake playing game!
Drop rollcakes and delete them all!

name: Duck Dynasty: Battle of the Beards
description:
Battle of the Beards tests your reflexes and drops you “boots-first” into the Louisiana backwoods to compete in the Robertson family’s favorite redneck activities. Master rapid-fire challenges, unlocking gear and earning experience along the way, to prove you’ve got what it takes to grow a beard as long as your favorite Duckmen.   As you play, your character will go from a Bluetooth-earpiece-wearing, clean-shaven businessman, to a fully camouflaged, long-haired, bandana-clad backwoodsman with a beard that would even make Phil jealous.  
Can you keep up as the pace increases? Or will you be left in the dust as the heat turns up?

name: Data Link: Cyberpunk Racing
description: Data Link is an adventure arcade game with storyline made in the cyberpunk style like data wing.

name: Xtreme Garage: Drifter
description: Xtreme Garage: Drifter is a 3D car racing game for drift and motorsport enthusiasts.

name: Speed Legends
description: Speed Legends takes the mobile racing & car driving genre to a whole new level by adding an addictive career mode, a gigantic open world, unlimited car tuning, stunning graphics and the most realistic car physics ever on mobile.

name: Pompom: The Great Space Rescue
description: In a whole new kind of puzzle-action platformer, you do not control Pompom the hamster, but instead use your quick thinking to help him by placing and controlling platforms, obstacles and items around him. Analyze and use everything that comes your way: build bridges, place springs, prune vines... Be clever, be quick, be efficient. Travel through outer space to beaches full of flying fish, to ancient temples lost in the jungle, as you help Pompom outsmart his enemies and rescue his boy Hoshi from Captain Cat and his crew.

name: Final 5: Survival!
description: Final 5 is a fast-paced, fun shooter, melee, time survival, adventure, action RPG game with roguelike elements. There’s no place else to run or hide, survival is your only goal.

name: Push Push Cat
description:
Push the blocks and make a way to save the cute cats who have lost their homes!!
Push Push Cat is a classic sliding puzzle game that anyone can easily learn and enjoy.
You can adopt cute homeless cats in various themes and customize them and shoot selfies.

You can meet many famous cats from around the world to empathize and heal.
Cats who are more affectionate than their stomachs, please come and pet them now!

name: Marshmallow 2x2
description:
Marshmallow 2x2 is a new number crunching game you have never played.
Are you ready for an unprecedented game play that will guarantee you will be addicted to it for the first time you play? Marshmallow 2X2 can do it! Please make sure you have enough time before you get it started!

name: Mr. Luma's Cooking Adventure
description:
Are you ready to go on a cooking adventure?
In Mr. Luma’s Cooking Adventure life is wonderful and relaxing. Explore a fairy-tale forest for all the ingredients nature has to offer, whether it’s delicious fruit, healthy vegetables or fresh fish. When your basket is full of goodies head back to your cozy tree house to cook for your furry little friends!
Let your imagination run wild in your fully equipped tree house kitchen! Slice, juice, fry and boil your ingredients. Once your plate is deliciously decorated, sit back and watch the adorable animals’ reactions.

name: Pigskin Punter!
description: Cute and silly arcade game about punting pigskins! Indie developer looking for feedback! Can you beat the game?

name: Iron Sky: A Lunar Adventure
description: You find yourself on the Moon in a downed flying saucer wearing a cracked space-suit helmet, under the watchful eye of Obergruppenführer Gruber of the Fourth Reich. One thing is certain: you don't belong here.

name: Bishoujo Senshi Sailor V
description: Bishoujo Senshi Sailor V is an Action game, developed and published by DK Software, which was released in Japan in 1994.

name: UsoNatsu: The Summer Romance Bloomed From a Lie
description: This is a story about finding love to overwrite the feelings for the one they held dearest. A girls love visual novel about summer, love and adolescence.

name: Fantasy Jigsaw Puzzles: Northlands
description: Under the northern lights, sparse tribes struggle against the cold. Great care must be taken in the Northlands. If the blizzards don't get you, the trolls just might!

name: Popgoes Evergreen
description: Popgoes is an official, fan-developed Five Nights at Freddy's spin-off series that only takes the first three FNaF games into account, and Popgoes Evergreen is the newest entry, officially backed by Scott Cawthon as part of the Fazbear Fanverse Initiative.

name: Squad Busters
description: Build a vast collection of Supercell characters, each bringing their own special ability to the battle. Wrestle enemies with Brawl Stars' El Primo, or spray bullets with Boom Beach's Heavy. Harvest Trees with Hay Day's Greg, or summon Skeletons with Clash's Witch!

name: Island Bender
description: Island Bender is a physics-based couch-fighting earthbending game with up to 6 players. Throw rocks at each other, collect power-ups, and master your bending style to beat your opponents.

name: Axiom
description: In a cyberpunk world where giant corporations take advantage of their power, only those with the ability to enter the human mind can stop corruption at its source. You are a mind assassin called Miles and this mind-bending first-person action-adventure is your story of revenge.

name: Baff 4
description: Minimalist, hardcore and challenging game in the genre of avoid-em up that will test your reflexes, timing and planning! This game is hard as hell!

name: Dokapon Kingdom: Connect
description:
Board game x RPG. This is Dokapon Kingdom: Connect.

The only condition for victory is to “earn more money than everyone else.” Players become “heroes” and aim to become “The Hero Who Earns the Most Money.”

The rules are simple. Stop the wheel, move, and follow the instructions on the space.

Defeat monsters, obtain items and treasures, change jobs, get robbed by strange characters, and even rob your friends of their money. No mercy for friends or family! The mischievous battle were anything goes begins now!

name: Battle of 2048: Fantasy Edition
description: Join Prince Olwyn on a quest to save his kingdom. Fierce warrior, stealthy rogue, powerful mage and skilled cleric will join your party as you fight enemies and strive for victory in this new take on the classic 2048. Can you and your team emerge triumphant and restore peace to the realm?

name: Belial Wars
description: Belial Wars - combination of two genres RTS and Tower Defense. You will take on the role of defender of the lands from the impending threat from the Underworld of demons.

name: Sunrider 4: The Captain's Return
description: Captain Kayto Shields returns from exile in Sunrider 4: The Captain's Return for a new space adventure!

name: Upward
description: This a port of Matthias Falk's Upward for the Playdate handheld!

name: Brawl Boys
description: Sin descripción

name: Age of Empires II: Deluxe Definitive Edition Bundle
description: Start your historical journey with the deluxe bundle designed to give you the most comprehensive Age of Empires II experience! Includes Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition plus three add-ons including Lords of the West, Dawn of the Dukes and Dynasties of India.

name: One Night at Flumpty's: The Egg Collection
description: One Night at Flumpty's: The Egg Collection is a console bundle featuring the three main titles from the One Night at Flumpty's series.

name: Ballads and Romances
description: Investigate the origins of the literary debut of Adam Mickiewicz, a XIX century-famous Polish poet. In an immersive visual novel, discover the secret of his love, friendship, and artistic inspirations!

name: Subnet: Escape Room Adventure
description: Do you have what it takes to puzzle your way through the underground subway system and stop the drkForce hacker groups underground exploit? Use your puzzle solving skills to make your way through the town and underground to track down the hackers and help stop their plans before they escape!

name: Cubis
description: "Cubis" is a good old classic style action puzzle. Roll the cube and and destroy the enemies and objects.

name: Spring X Elixir
description: Spring X Elixir presents a modern alchemist girl named Wick Sugar, who stumbles upon a mysterious sixth Spring element besides the Five Elements when slaying evil spirits. Help her defeat the evil spirits, which have the Spring element, and enjoy the charm of Spring Horny Aphrodisiacs together!

name: ReactorX 2
description: Be an android mechanic in ReactorX 2 and restore power to your spaceship after a pirate attack. Navigate 5 sectors, solve 30 levels and use new arm-magnet & wrench mechanics to succeed in this puzzle game. 6 energy types & personal indicator to boost gameplay experience.

name: CryptoZoo
description: It's a fun game. It's a really fun game.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days - Character Set 05: Raika Koshiba
description: Set including Fighter "Raika Koshiba" and sleeves.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days - Character Set 04: Urara Haneyama
description: Set including Fighter "Urara Haneyama" and sleeves.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days - Additional Deck D-TD03: Raika Koshiba - Skyfall Executors
description: This content includes the deck recipe and the cards of D-TD03.

name: Sky Rider
description: Skyrider is a fun and relaxing endless runner. Attempt a highscore, challenges, or simply enjoy the atmosphere of an endless futuristic city. Complete challenges to earn credits, which can be spent on character cosmetics.

name: Rethm: Once Upon a Time
description: An RPG that takes you on a journey through inverted time. Rain falls from below to above, and defeated enemies come back to life. Encounters become partings, and the story moves toward its beginning.

name: Bandit
description: Bandit is an RPG-survival with an open world and elements of tower defense, where you can build own base, gang and vehicle.

name: Petz
description: Dogz and Catz look to you for care, guidance, and training. Sign an adoption pledge promising to be a good Petz owner. Weather effects and day-and-night cycles provide a more realistic setting. Playscenes and mini-games create a whole new interactive experience. There is a variety of dog and cat breedz to choose from.

name: Pokémon Adventures: Green Chapter
description: One day, a girl from Pallet Town was kidnapped by a mysterious flying Pokemon. Few years later, she returned back to her home only to discovered life has moved on without her. Lost and enraged, she decided to get revenge on those who kidnapped her which eventually got her entwined with Team Rocket and a boy named Red

name: Overwatch 2: Season 3 - Asian Mythology
description: Drop into season three to explore the depths of the coolest new control map, Antarctic Peninsula. Compete in limited-time in-game events, such as Ultimate Valentine. Customize your heroes with new skins and cosmetics from the Battle Pass and weekly Shop drops. Now earn Credits in the Battle Pass that can be redeemed for over 250 cosmetics from the original Overwatch, and go premium to get exclusive rewards, such as Mythic Amaterasu Kiriko.

name: Rockman 2 de Ippatsu Neta
description: A Mega Man 2 fangame in which you fight all 8 robot masters simultaneously.

name: Candyman: Be My Victim Demake
description: Play as Candyman & eviscerate anyone that dares to say your name 5 times in front of a mirror in this NES demake.

name: Luma
description: Luma is laser based sliding puzzle game for Commodore Amiga where the goal is to connect lasers to targets of same color by using mirrors to deflect the beam. Activate the lasers using batteries. Each level must be solved within a specific amount of moves (shifts).

name: Crazy islands
description:
Crazy islands is a game in which you will have to collect some resources to build a boat and escape from islands where natural disasters occur.

The game has several levels in which the shape of the island and natural disasters vary.

name: Master's Fury
description: Master's Fury is an arcade fighting game from Unico, and is a sequel of sorts to Dragon Master.

name: Micro Breaker
description: Micro Breaker - is a fresh take on a brick breaking game with a great and expanded gameplay that you've never seen before. Here you can acquire and upgrade amazing power-ups that will change your odds in more difficult stages. You can unlock different paddles and balls that you can use to beat the high scores and smash your way through the online rankings!

name: Gothic: The Dark Secrets
description: Dark Secrets is a powerful modification to the Gothic cRPG developed by the PoziomkaZ group. The project does not introduce a completely new campaign, and instead its task is to enrich the original storyline prepared by the Piranha Bytes studio with additional missions and plots. Players take on the role of Nameless, and the plot of the new elements revolves around the Ancient Ones, i.e. powerful beings serving Innos. The authors have developed new locations and adventures, five additional factions and dozens of characters. In addition, it was made possible to impersonate a Magnate and take part in arena battles. All this has been superbly integrated with the basic version of the game and made in a quality that more resembles an official add-on than a fan production. In addition, there are so many novelties that you can go through the main campaign again without feeling bored, as the modifications introduced by the authors effectively refresh the overall formula.

name: Lackadaisium
description: Lackadaisium is a surrealist adventure game with puzzle and action elements. It is autobiographical. Made stream-of-consciousness style during a six year-long depressive episode, it aims not just to be a fun adventure, but also to make you feel and confront all sorts of uncomfortable emotions that the author experienced during that time.

name: My Sweet Devilish Maids
description:
On your way home from school, you spot a cat that's about to get hit by a truck. You jump in to save it, and the next thing you know, everything turns black.

When you open your eyes and realize you're now just a wandering soul, you're approached by three cute demon girls. You expect to be their next meal, but instead, they sweep you away to a quaint, little cafe where you're greeted by the cat you just rescued! Apparently the cat is the owner of the establishment, and as thanks for saving his life, he's offered you a position to work for him as a waiter. He promises to bring you back to your body, but only if you do a good job—so get cracking!

Luckily you'll have your cute coworkers to guide you, that is if they're not already planning some mischief of their own.

name: The Kill Kar II: Revenge
description: The Kill Kar II: Revenge is a driving/horror Flash game and sequel to the Kill Kar created by JAZZA.

name: IQ Ball
description:
Your goal is to get the little purple IQ Ball critter to the target. To do this, you shoot out with his grabber and latch onto things to move him along towards his goal.

The fewer the moves you use, the better!

name: Enigmata
description: An epic space adventure game. Fly through 20 levels, gather powerful weapons and ships!

name: Enigmata 2: Genu's Revenge
description: The Enigmata galaxy is in peril once again, you and Neko are the only ones who can solve this crisis.

name: Titanfall Legends
description: Titanfall Legends is a cancelled game developed by Respawn Entertainment and planned to be published by Electronic Arts. The game was meant to be a single-player game set in the universe shared by the Apex Legends and Titanfall games.

name: Insane Orb
description: Insane Orb is a Flash game by wvaldez. It is a Skill game similar to Pong, the classic arcade sports game.

name: Infectonator!
description: What if you are the one who caused the zombie apocalypse? Can you destroy the world in just 60 seconds? Infect people and turn them into zombies in this simple and fun game, compare your high-score with your friends and see who is the best Infectonator!

name: Infectonator Hot Chase
description: In this game, players will be able to control a horde of zombies going through all obstacles with utmost haste for the love of their (undead) life.

name: Juushin Rogus
description:
The space federation has assigned you a critical mission on planet Sagoth: defeat the forces of Geisel, a professor turned conqueror. Using lost technology found within Sagoth's ruins, and supplies left across the planet, he's created a robotic army superior to anything the federation can muster. You're going alone, using a bipedal mech based on what little of Geisel's research has been intercepted. It's time to reclaim your lost bases, eliminate the scientist's legions, and uncover the secrets lying beneath this world.

Juushin ROGUS combines turn-based strategy, side-scrolling shooter action, and a light RPG layer into one accessible story. Managing and moving between your military bases, which automatically produce new units you can distribute, is crucial to success. Defending or attacking a base leads to action-platforming combat, where you jump, shoot, and fly across a battlefield full of limited replenishing enemies. As you destroy foes, your mech levels up over time, acquiring new weapons, aerial boosters, and even pilot bodyguards later on. To win, you must claim the final base and defeat Geisel in his lair—but it won't be easy.

name: Elves and Ornaments
description: Find out the reason why millions of ornaments are lost every year.

name: EekoWorld
description: EekoWorld was a webpage on pbskids.org. On this webpage, you could play 2 main minigames all themed around cleaning up trash and protecting the environment alongside the learning pages about the environment.

name: Beveron
description: Beveron is 3D racing game. Your goal is to get all collectibles in each level under certain time. There are many levels to beat and hopefully enjoy.

name: Package
description: This fan game is based on the lore of the character 'Anna Amur Tiger'. In this game you have to deliver a package to Anna! Find out where the tiger is hiding! Deliver the package and don't stop until you succeed. Remember, nothing is what it seems...

name: Guns & Fishes
description: Guns and Fishes is a fast-paced action platform game that uses fishes as ammo for fighting various enemies. Help Diver to fight against the evil shark yakuza who wants to steal all the corals for their magical powers. Fight your foes with various weapons and advance through the map with your skills

name: Mighty Mage
description: Mighty Mage is a top-down arena shooter rogue-lite where you play a cute mage wielding up to 5 elemental spells at a time to fight off hordes of enemies. Choose from a variety of upgrades and spells to create unique builds.

name: Skelethrone: The Prey
description: This game is a challenging 2D action platformer with RPG elements inspired by games like Castlevania and Dark Souls. Skelethrone: The Prey is a free prequel to the main game, setting the stage for the events that will unfold throughout Skelethrone: The Chronicles of Ericona campaign.

name: Duplicado
description: Duplicado is a unique, procedurally-generated puzzle game that is both meditative and challenging. Journey across a peaceful avocado orchard, planting trees as you slide and solve your way through a nearly endless number of stimulating puzzles.

name: Plasmarena
description: Plasmarena is a top down arena shooter ideal for casual play with friends. Shatter them to pieces in an endless arena of digital death!

name: Dragon Forest
description: Combining the Rogue-like with puzzles resulted in an attractive deck building game. Build your own deck and defeat the dragon ruling the forest. See if you're the chosen hero to defeat the dragon!

name: Let's Play Jigsaw Puzzles: Greece & Turkey
description: Uncover the Ancient Splendor of Greece and Turkey!

name: Lost With You
description: Lost With You is a survival game with a visual novel added to it. You must use all available resources to survive on a deserted island, and also maintain good relations with your companion.

name: A Tower Full of Cats
description: A Tower Full of Cats is a hidden object game where you need to pet cats through the whole history of mankind... and beyond!

name: Conjury Revell
description: Conjury Revell is a first-person action game from the students at SMU Guildhall. Use your magical spells and abilities to eliminate waves of faceless oppressors as they attempt to keep you from rebelling against the system.

name: Changeling Charade
description: Put on a magical disguise to find true love! As a changeling, will you stay among the human nobility, or join the fairy revolution?

name: Garbage Truck Simulator
description: The compactor is hungry! 3D simulation game with authentic trucks and realtime destruction physics. Fill the compactor with garbage and keep pressing the button until everything has been smashed. Drive the truck from one stop to the next and collect every pile of garbage from the streets.

name: Speed Rush Runners
description: Sin descripción

name: Adventure Island Merge
description: Sin descripción

name: Sweet Sins 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Winterstate
description: Sin descripción

name: Zombie Waves
description: Sin descripción

name: Zoldout Global
description: Sin descripción

name: Kuna Tap: Space Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: White Island: Season 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Cubes Empire Champions
description: Sin descripción

name: Dino Terror 2: Jurassic Escape
description: Sin descripción

name: Zombie Clicker RPG
description: Sin descripción

name: Solitaire: Wild Park
description: Sin descripción

name: Idle Brick Breaker
description: Sin descripción

name: OverDrive Legends

Humans, Elves, Dwarves, and all the other races laid aside their differences to form an alliance for their survival.
